reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, well-made, and warm, with one noting it's not itchy like other sweaters.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend!
items.body: So cute! It is good quality and is warm! I am 5'8, 150lbs, and I am a true large in most things, but ordered this in a M and it fits perfectly, so the fit is a little oversized. It is probably not long enough to cover your bottom in leggings, but looks cute with jeans. Read more
items.author: Courtney Ford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loose fit style
items.body: Super cute holiday sweater. Fit is perfect .. for reference I’m 5”7 and I ordered medium. It’s a loose fit style and I feel it is long enough to wear with leggings. Soft and cozy and a little off the shoulder for a sexy look. Read more
items.author: kcee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty style
items.body: Beautifully made sweater. I bought a medium because I like things oversized, but it felt too bulky even thought the length was perfect in the medium. I did return and didn’t reorder a smaller size because I wasn’t sure if the length would be shorter. Style is very pretty. Read more
items.author: momof3

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect chunky knit sweater!
items.body: This sweater was perfect! It is thick and warm, and I love the oversized style. The fabric is very soft and not itchy like other sweaters. The bow detailing on the back was the cherry on top! Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size down!
items.body: Very cute and warm, runs big! Read more
items.author: Whitney J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality & fit
items.body: Love the fit and the quality! Ordered a L initially but ended up returning for a M as it was too big. Medium is still loose but fits a little tighter on the waist and doesn’t look too bulky. Read more
items.author: Megan R

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute Sweater!
items.body: This sweater is adorable and has a very relaxed fit. The sweater itself is thick, but the knit of the sweater is larger, making it appear a bit cheap, but not deal breakingly so. I love the sweater and am entering it into the special occasion/low use clothing section to protect it from pilling and other signs of wear. I would give this 5 stars if I didn't feel there was a slight risk to showing wear. This is sweater works well for tall women and is true to size. As long as you don't size up too much any undergarments will not be visible. No special bra's required. Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sweater
items.body: Super cute sweater, wore it for Christmas work party Read more
items.author: Victoria

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 0-green, 1-white&black, 0-brown, 6-grey, 1-apricot, 5-apricot, 0-apricot&leopard, 0-apricot, 0-dark Gray, 0-white&black, 0-black, 0-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
